description:
Nice studio apartment for sublet. The space is all for you. No roommates!

30 seconds to Prospect Park. It's convenient as there are lots of delis, bars, restaurants, coffee places around. 3 minute walk to the B/Q/S subway station Prospect Park. 25 minutes to Union Square. 2 stops to/from Atlantic Ave Barclays Center.

I would love to have someone who can use the space clean. No couples.
name: Studio Apartment in Prospect Lefferts Gardens
